DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective propose study determine whether behavioral feed intervention impact mother-child attachment infant toddler feed problem . The investigator propose follow hypothesis : - Behavioral feeding intervention significantly impact parent-child attachment . - Behavioral feeding intervention significantly impact parent-child unstructured play interaction . - Severity feed problem decrease behavioral feed intervention implement . - Behavioral feeding intervention either significant effect significant positive effect general child behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Behavioral Feeding Intervention Parent-Child Attachment Young Children
